Author: porcu93
Description: A set of challenging missions based around the Quadruple Decker bomb casing. Each bomb contains 71 of the same module. Requires the 6x6 Mega Bomb mod, the Multiple Bombs mod for the missions with at least 2 bombs and the Portal Room for missions with 3 and 4 bombs.
Name: Multiple 6x6 Mega-Bombs Psychosis
